title: Drawing, "Decorative Motifs; Verso: Anatomical Studies", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes with traces of graphite on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Two studies of ceilings with grotestsque; two decorative partitions. Verso: three anatomical studies with detailed rendering of knee joint and both elbows.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Decorative Motifs; Verso: Anatomical Studies", 1814–18. Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes with traces of graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2303.
